name: owfn-site
description: A global network united by the vision to build a better world through technology and humanity.

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/index.html && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/bundle.js --loader:.ts=ts --loader:.tsx=tsx --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"'

author: OWFN
